message: Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mDrawingThread' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mWorkingBitmap' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mWorkingBitmapRect' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mWorkingBitmapCanvas' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mFramePaint' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mClearPaint' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mSurfaceCanBeUsed' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
